Reviews.Title: Excellent Buy
Reviews.Author: ReggieB
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera.  Addition of the 3 lens kit makes it well worth the price, especially the 50mm prime lense.  The additional items in the bundle aren't what I expected but the camera and lenses more than make up for those items.

Reviews.Title: Bag size
Reviews.Author: Steven
Reviews.Content: Bag was not large enough to fit all of the things in the bundle. Overall a great product! I like the camera

Reviews.Title: All over a good deal..with little bumbs
Reviews.Author: Heiko Baller
Reviews.Content: Great Camera...and for sure a good deal. Tripod is cheap and instabile...better you by a diffrent one if you are inot Photo. Lenses are not great....but for begining of this Hobby enaugh.
